original_text: The company of the prophets from Jericho, who were watching, said, “The spirit of Elijah is resting on Elisha.” And they went to meet him and bowed to the ground before him.
korean_text: 맞은편 여리고에 있는 선지자의 제자들이 그를 보며 말하기를 엘리야의 성령이 하시는 역사가 엘리사 위에 머물렀다 하고 가서 그에게로 나아가 땅에 엎드려 그에게 경배하고

sentences.original_text: The company of the prophets from Jericho
The spirit of Elijah is resting on Elisha
And they went to meet him
and bowed to the ground before him
